Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO ENVIRONMENTAL CONSERVATION

Title: Prohibits the aerial and ground application of malathion and certain pyrethroid-based insecticides
Summary: Prohibits the aerial and ground application of malathion and certain pyrethroid-based insecticides within one hundred feet of any school, day care center or park.
LawCode: Add Art 37 Title 12 §§37-1201 - 37-1209, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to prohibiting the aerial and ground application of malathion and certain pyrethroid-based insecticides
